landing.hero_description: No more paperwork or manual controls! Keep your shop organized, boost your profits, and delight your customers with a fast, easy, and complete system. Manage work orders, inventory, sales, and finances in just a few clicks.
landing.trusted_by: Trusted by shops all over Brazil
landing.features_title: Everything your shop needs to grow
landing.features_description: Automate tasks, avoid mistakes, save time, and take full control of your business. Our platform is designed to make your routine easier and your results better.
landing.feature_smart_automation_desc: Open, track, and close work orders in seconds. Full history for every vehicle and customer.
landing.feature_advanced_analytics_desc: See exactly how much you profit, your best-selling services, and where to improve.
landing.feature_team_collaboration_desc: Track mechanic performance, assign tasks, and boost productivity.
landing.feature_enterprise_security_desc: Your data is safe in the cloud, with automatic backups and secure access from anywhere.
landing.feature_seamless_integration_desc: Track stock in/out and minimums. Never lose a sale for lack of parts again.
landing.feature_support_desc: Talk to experts who understand auto shops and really help you, whenever you need.
landing.how_title: Get started in minutes and see the difference
landing.how_description: Just create your account, add your services and products, and that's it! Your shop is more organized and profitable from day one.
landing.how_step1_desc: Fill in your details and get instant access to the system.
landing.how_step2_desc: Add services, products, and set up everything for your routine.
landing.how_step3_desc: Manage work orders, inventory, sales, and finances easily. Focus on what matters: growing your business!
landing.testimonials_title: See how shop owners are earning more
landing.testimonials_description: Discover real stories from those who increased profits, reduced errors, and won more customers using our system.
landing.testimonial_1_quote: The system made it much easier to control work orders and inventory. Now I have more time to focus on my customers.
landing.testimonial_2_quote: With the reports, I can see where I'm making the most and adjust my prices. I recommend it to any shop.
landing.testimonial_3_quote: Support is excellent! Every time I needed help, I was quickly and attentively assisted.
landing.testimonial_4_quote: I never lost a sale due to missing parts again. The inventory control is amazing.
landing.testimonial_5_quote: The team is more productive and organized. The system is easy to use and very complete.
landing.testimonial_6_quote: Implementation was fast and the return came in the first month. I recommend it!
landing.pricing_description: Choose the perfect plan for your shop. All with 14 days free and no commitment.
landing.pricing_starter_desc: For those starting out and wanting real organization.
landing.pricing_professional_desc: For growing shops seeking more control and agility.
landing.pricing_enterprise_desc: For large shops or chains needing complete features.
landing.faq_description: Get all your questions answered about how our solution can transform your shop.
landing.faq_q1: How does the 14-day free trial work?
landing.faq_a1: You can use all features of the system for free and without a credit card. At the end, choose the best plan for your shop.
landing.faq_q2: Can I migrate my data from another system?
landing.faq_a2: Yes! Our team helps you import customers, vehicles, and work order history.
landing.faq_q3: Does the system work on mobile and tablet?
landing.faq_a3: Yes, the platform is 100% online and responsive. You can access it from any device with internet.
landing.faq_q4: Can I issue receipts and financial reports?
landing.faq_a4: Yes, you can issue receipts, sales reports, cash flow, and much more.
landing.faq_q5: How many users can I register?
landing.faq_a5: It depends on your plan. Check the plan details for user limits.
landing.faq_a6: We offer support by email, chat, and phone, according to your plan. Our team is ready to help.
landing.cta_title: Ready to take the next step?
landing.cta_description: Join hundreds of shops that have already increased profits and simplified management. Try it free and be amazed!
landing.cta_note: No credit card. 14 days free. Easy, hassle-free cancellation.
landing.footer_description: The solution that puts your shop on the path to growth. More control, more profit, more time for you.
